item.title: I need help with shops plz sumbody help
item.dc:creator: @Greenspirit Greenspirit
item.description:
@Greenspirit wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[quote=“guthan38, post:1, topic:35001”]Purpose: To add a new shop in which you can have different currency

Difficulty: 3

Assumed Knowledge: Know where to add things

Server Base: All

Classes Modified: Client.java

Procedure
Step 1: In client.java add this:

[code] public boolean loadNAMEShops()
{

    String line = "";
    String token = "";
    String token2 = "";
    boolean EndOfFile = false;
    int ReadMode = 0;
    BufferedReader characterfile = null;
    try{
        characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("NAMEShops.cfg"));
    }
    catch(FileNotFoundException fileex){
        sendMessage("TS: Error loading NAME shops");
        return false;
    }
    try{
        line = characterfile.readLine();
    }
    catch(IOException ioexception){
        sendMessage("TS: Error loading [WHAT TYPE OF SHOP HERE] shops [e]");
        return false;
    }
    while(EndOfFile == false && line != null){
        line = line.trim();
        int spot = line.indexOf("=");
        if(spot > -1){
            token = line.substring(0, spot);
            token = token.trim();
            token2 = line.substring(spot + 1);
            token2 = token2.trim();

if(token.equals("shopid"))
{
	NAMEShop = Integer.parseInt(token2);
}


          if(line.equals("[EOF]")){
                try{
                    characterfile.close();
                }
                catch(IOException ioexception){}
                return true;
         }
        }
        try{
            line = characterfile.readLine();
        }
        catch(IOException ioexception1){
            EndOfFile = true;
        }
    }
    try{
        characterfile.close();
    }
    catch(IOException ioexception){}
    return false;
}[/code]

Step 2: Now…if you have public void CheckCoinType add this:

else if(SellerID == NAMEShop) { coinType = ITEMID; currency = "NAME OF CURRENCY"; }

Step 3: However, if you do not have it add this:

public void CheckCoinType() { if(SellerID != NAMEShop) { coinType = 995; currency = "coins"; } else if(SellerID == NAMEShop) { coinType = ITEM ID; currency = "NAME OF CURRENCY"; } }

Step 4: Declare these:

public int NAMEShop; public String currency = "coins"; public int coinType;

Step 5: Add this under boolean process:

loadNAMEShops();

Credits: ME

Now to explain, everywhere where is says NAME add the Name of the shop you want. You would then make a .cfg file named whatever you call it. In the cfg file you would put this:

[code][SHOPS]

shopid = [Shop ID]

[EOF][/code]

NOTE: This just makes it where you still put in the stuff in client.java so you still have to put the shop in shops.cfg just like normal. Also if you don’t want to change the currency just put 995 where it says coinType = ITEM ID; currency = "NAME OF CURRENCY";

Hope this helps some people :D[/quote]

Hope that helps
-Greenspirit
